entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
